message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13750. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $13250. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if I can go above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
I understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $13100. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12900?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $12950. This is my final offer. What do you think?
